about-me:
I have almost 5 years of experience in the development field. In that time I had contact with several technologies and colleagues who taught me and inspired me to be a great professional, in addition to learning how e-commerce works in general.
I have a degree in Information Systems and I have experience in Front End development using technologies such as JavaScript, HTML, CSS and frameworks such as React and Vue.
I am interested in learning new technologies, studying and putting into practice all the knowledge I have acquired over the years in order to meet the requirements and add value to society.

item1.title: High School
item1.description: I studied at Colégio Tradição since I was little and there I got my initial training, which led me to decide what I wanted to do in life.

item2.title: University Education
item2.description: I studied at Faculdade Estácio Florianópolis for 4 years and there I got my Bachelor's Degree in Information Systems.
